events.message: The claimant reported a car accident that occurred on February 28th involving a collision at an intersection.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to involvement of a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the claimant with further procedures.
The claim has been acknowledged and confirmation sent to the customer appreciating the submission.
Request for accident photos, police report, and vehicle registration documents has been sent to the customer.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including police report, photos, and vehicle damages.
Investigation into the cause and responsibility of the vehicle collision has officially begun.
Investigation findings concluded the claimant was not at fault for the accident.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and related costs has been proposed to the claimant.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely handling and proposed settlement offer.
Claim approval finalized, authorizing payment to the claimant for vehicle damages.
Payment has been issued to the claimantâ€™s account covering the agreed settlement amount.
The claim case is now officially closed after successful settlement and payment distribution.
All claim documents and records have been archived in the system for long-term storage.
